item.description:
Spagetty, (store or homemade)
Italian Bred, etc...wine .. but not too much stuff..
a little of a larger variety is better than overstuffing..etc..

I got the spagetty and/or can make either or both..i make the garlick shrimp too..

Plenty of cooking surfaces available 6 burners. (2) outside ones for the smelly stuff.. (but it all smells good...) or for more room....
and the portable grill...
but my baking oven is damaged, i use the toaster oven for most bred theings..etc..

if its warm enough outside i plan on hooking up the bigger gas log (i just ordered it and it better arrive soon)..to the domestic gas line outdoors on the deck, otherwise i use the little one with propaine for the Fire Side Wine and Evening Chat...

if its too cold out..
I have some dance music..but a very limited amount..i think the dvd player plays music and works on the stereo..its supposed to...


Ok getting to AL's


I live at 321 Silas Deane Highway in Wethersfield..(the map link above is accurate enough) its a business section but i have one of the last 12 or so residential houses on the street..(the 5th or 6th one down on the right or west side) ...from hartford area take 84 east to 91 south...take exit #28 (same exit number for either 91 north or south)..its the 5/15 exit to wethersfield..from there take the next exit #85? on to (rte 99 south= Silas Deane Hwy) it should also say DMV also somewhere, take right off exit..you cant turn left anyway here..go strait (south)on Silas Deane hwy ..Landmarks=pass Murcury Oil Gas Satation on right, Price Right store on left and ...further a police station and Drunkin donuts...2 streets on right cumberland st then oxford st....now..on the left is a bunch of businesses..the medium bright medium-blue house is a hair dresser shop..im directly across from it in a small off white little ranch...
On the mail box on the side of the house the #321 is in orange/red...
I will put 2 traffic cones on the end of the driveway on the posts...and the glow in the dark SNOWMAN somewhere visible...
they will stick out im sure......

Pull way into the back yard...
Im parked at the house next door...
if my yard is full, then park there but leave the left side garage door accessable for my sister..

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Italian Food at AL's
